snippet.title: Challenge Map Pack - Batman: Arkham City
snippet.description:
Find us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/batmanarkhamcity

Download the Challenge Map Pack! This pack contains three all new challenge maps: The Joker's Carnival, Iceberg Lounge and The Batcave. These challenge maps are playable as Batman and any of the downloadable playable characters Catwoman, Night Wing and Robin.

Available now via Xbox Live and PlayStation Network.
